title: Middle Eastern roast guinea fowl with saffron couscous
ingredients: ['1 large guinea fowl, about 1.5kg', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lemon', '1 tbsp runny honey', '2 tbsp olive oil', '½ tsp ground ginger', '½ tsp ground cinnamon', '1 tsp ground cumin', '3 small red onions, each cut into 6 wedges', 'Couscous stuffing', '300g couscous', '¼ tsp saffron', '500ml chicken or vegetable stock, boiling', '75g ready-to-eat dried figs, roughly chopped', '50g shelled unsalted pistachios, roughly chopped']
